website_summaries.verdict: If you only need a concealer to hide discoloration under your eyes, this one is worth a look. However, it's not as versatile as others on our shortlist.
pros: Contains ingredients that diffuse light and colored, natural clay that conceals dark circles
Can be used underneath other concealers to color correct
Doesn't tend to crease or settle in fine lines
cons: Only available in two shades, which won't work for everyone
Somewhat drying, especially for those who are already prone to dry skin

customer_reviews.title: The best product out there for dark eye circles
customer_reviews.text: I use the Tarte CC Corrector everyday, it's amazing. I have used this CC for about 4 years, and each container lasts me about 6 months, which is great. I have terrible allergies, so I get dark circles under my eyes which isn't always easy to cover. This is the perfect product to use, as it's not too heavy on your face and has the right amount of coverage. I haven't found another product that works as well as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Leach

customer_reviews.title: not for fair skinned people
customer_reviews.text: I work night shift and have horrible allergies, thus causing TERRIBLE dark circles under my eyes. This product ended up being a waste of money, as every other i have tried. It goes on thick- no matter how lightly you try to put it on, it does not blend into your skin but rather cakes on, and it is definitely not for fair skinned people. I tried the light-medium corrector, but it makes my skin orange. I reached out to the seller and told them of these things prior to posting this review, however, the declined to reply. On to the next product, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: rcb

customer_reviews.title: Best Under Eye Coverup!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many under eye corrector's and couldn't find any I felt worked well so I decided to look into online beauty blogs to see what others suggested. That's when I came across Tarte as a preferred option. I decided to give it a try and have since fell in love! Works perfectly to cover up my dark under eye circles. Before and after pics with 1 layer applied.!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Amazing coverage, I love the Pixi concentrate and this has just replaced it. I’m into the natural “your self but better makeup” this looks so natural and dewy. I do have really dry skin and even dryer under eyes and this is very hydrating.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana nelson

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that covers my dark circles. This is a Holy Grail product for me. I highly recommend it to all the other pale girls out there who have a hard time covering those circles!
customer_reviews.author: dammit sammit

customer_reviews.title: Great for covering dark circles!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had dark circles under my eyes. I was on set for a film & after getting hair and make up done, my skin looked so bright and glowy. I asked the make-up artists waht she used & it was this product. After that I was sold and have used it since! This is my go to product for covering those circles.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Alvord

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality concealer that was sold out at sephora when I went. Of course. I use the lightest shade. I also like their foundation w spf. I think their makeup in general is really good. Also I once had makeup professionally done and artist likes this brand too for my skin. Its medium coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaidshopper

customer_reviews.title: My very favorite under eye concealer
customer_reviews.text: My very favorite under eye concealer. I have genetic ' dark circles' under my eyes and have searched high and low. I have a few other favorites, but this is the winner. It is VERY thick, so blending is important- but a few brush strokes and I'm done. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tarte - Corrector vs Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I’m over 60 with Scandinavian dark circles. I strongly prefer this Tarte Corrector over the cult-like Tarte Concealer. The Corrector is thicker and moister resulting in better coverage for severe cases of dark circles. While not for everyone, I will definitely buy the Corrector again. Know anybody who wants a barely used Tarte concealer? 😉
customer_reviews.author: A 60 year old’s perspective

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This was a good cost effective purchase. I do not seem to use it very often now due to having new products that seem to work better for me & my skin
customer_reviews.author: David & Chaia Kloster

customer_reviews.title: Good for Eyebags!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t return this if you purchase it! I accidentally did, and couldn’t ever get a return. Good thing I use this in general...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Great cover I use daily. Hides the dark circles and stays all day. I use an under eye cream 1st than apply the CC clay followed by the TARTE concealer wand
customer_reviews.author: Dave Kobielski

customer_reviews.title: Helps Cover Dark Under Eye
customer_reviews.text: I have dark under eye area it helps but I have to apply quite a bit and reapply. I like the texture.
customer_reviews.author: K.K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how this gets poor reviews. It’s amazing. It works best with a brush, not fingers. It makes my whole face look brighter. Though thick, it blends great. It matches my skin tone perfectly and provides great coverage. Extra bonus-It’s great that it doesn’t have palm oil and is cruelty free, too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 5 stars because it did work very well but you can find much cheaper ones that work just as well so it probably wasn't worth $15.. definitely not $25 (price at Sephora).
customer_reviews.author: BL4CK5HEEP1015

customer_reviews.title: ... dark circles for about 30 years and this works wonderfully. I'll definitely be buying this again
customer_reviews.text: Normally I wouldn't spend this much on makeup but I have battled dark circles for about 30 years and this works wonderfully. I'll definitely be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M. Gildersleeve

customer_reviews.title: really great coverage and texture
customer_reviews.text: Covers some very dark circles, which I have. I like the creamy texture too.
customer_reviews.author: David Lambert

customer_reviews.title: You’re tried the rest, now try the best!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my dark circles on my pale/reddish skin. Better than all the toxic ones I tried!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaya

customer_reviews.title: Was an opened and used product!
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and although it was in the box when I opened the concealer someone had already searched it with what looks like their thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this undereye corrector! I have been using it for years and nothing beats it!
customer_reviews.author: R.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy and fast application and fast(I use my ring finger) with perfect coverage: not too heavy and not too light! Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie M.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite concealer. It is easy to apply, the color is good and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn Tornetta

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: I've always been self conscious about the dark circles under my eyes, I have tried many products and this is the only one that actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: To dark, cakey
customer_reviews.text: The color did not work well at all and it's hard to spead
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Better than anything else I have tried!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's a actual correcting tone- not a concealer. It's lasting a long time. Will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Schwartzie

customer_reviews.title: Tarte CC Concealer
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Found out about it at Sephora and immediately ordered it from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome under-eye corrector
customer_reviews.text: Greatest under-eye corrector I've ever used. Covers up great and looks flawless on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tunia

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come as described. There are two different colors in mine and I can only use one.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Evans

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: bought this because I heard that it gave great coverage and it did
customer_reviews.author: paulie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, amazing coverage for dark under eye circles ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, amazing coverage for dark under eye circles or any discoloration in the face. I'm totally in love !!!
customer_reviews.author: Fatenah

customer_reviews.title: Not for severe dark circles.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking there was a good chance it’s fake, received it and didn’t like the product so I assumed it had to be fake...I went to Ulta and bought it for $24 and shockingly it’s the same thing. So very happy it wasn’t fake, but the product is too light weight for me. The darkness under my eyes is severe so I wasn’t terribly surprised, just disappointed. The formula is smooth and creamy and lightweight. It’s an ok product, just relaying to folks that this is the real product, it just didn’t work at all for me.
customer_reviews.author: shoe_lover

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have dark under-eye circles, and have tried countless products. This REALLY helps! I wear it under my concealer, and there is a NOTICEABLE difference when I do/don't wear it. This product is great because it can be worn alone as well, without making you look weird. I have fair skin, and this product is perfect. I will be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty333

customer_reviews.title: Full night's sleep in a little square
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for (and reviewed by) my wife: This product is my favorite under-eye concealer. The orange tone not only counteracts dark under-eye circles, but the waxy consistency lends a kind of shine that mimics the texture of real skin. There's a learning curve to getting just the right amount of product warmed up with the fingertip, dabbed just the right way in just the right area and blended out in dabbing motions just so...but the effect is lovely. It will settle into fine lines, so be sure to set with a very fine powder as soon as you have finished applying.
customer_reviews.author: Menard

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer EVER! Covers up dark under-eye circles and doesn’t collect in tiny wrinkles. I love this product! I’m 66 with pretty good skin, few fine lines, but I would recommend this for any age skin. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon6015Top Contributor: Deadpool

customer_reviews.title: Circles Be Gone
customer_reviews.text: Best undereye product I have ever bought. I am 54 years old and have bought lots of makeup. Can't do without this now.
customer_reviews.author: CSmith

customer_reviews.title: The perfect undereye
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I’ve tried so many different undereye concealers, and this is by far the best. Doesn’t dry up, blends easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Welch

customer_reviews.title: I been used this for long I'm very happy bc I have a terrible under bags in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I been used this for long I'm very happy bc I have a terrible under bags in my eyes they cover good
customer_reviews.author: Lisbe

customer_reviews.title: it does a great job at hiding my undereye circles
customer_reviews.text: While I wish it had a bit more coverage, it does a great job at hiding my undereye circles. Very easy to apply and buildable. I tend to skip makeup brushes in lieu of my fingers. I just dab a little under my eye and continue to build until I reach the desired effect.
customer_reviews.author: JHupp

product_meta.title: TARTE TARTE CC Colored clay undereye corrector in LIGHT MEDIUM
